ygData.subject: Re: sail the high seas or Swamping at Guk
ygData.msgSnippet: wish I could help but spent all my $$$ on banded and 1 kite shield broke again. u can hunt wisp now rite? they sell for 4.1pp for my half elf. u get 6 or 7
ygData.messageBody:
wish I could help but spent all my $$$ on banded and 1 kite shield broke
again. u can hunt wisp now rite? they sell for 4.1pp for my half elf. u get
6 or 7 sure got enough.
----- Original Message -----
From: LKW <leekw13@...>
To: <sg-everquest@onelist.com>
Sent: Thursday, June 03, 1999 13:48
Subject: Re: [sg-everquest] sail the high seas or Swamping at Guk


> From: LKW <leekw13@...>
>
> > Last weekend, saturday. Leshrec, Trifrost and I was suposed to go to
> > Faydwek. I was looking forward to it. too bad the ship didnt come. it
was
> > "under repair"
>
> Last night I heard someone saying it's repaired.
>
> > Im still keen to venture out there.
>
> Ya, u sure can kill the orc with the shinny shield in CB (Crushbone, not
> xxxxxx), guess tat's something monk can look forward to ;) Or get the
> dwarven chain tunic from the CB king. I know the sister bandit camp is
> giving bronze weap which can be sold at few pp too.
>
> > Another option came up last nite while i was with Leshrec and Eldor ( we
> > were at the Oasis of Marr killin Crocs and Caiman)
> > Eldor is a Rogue and is a close buddy of Trifrost. We starting talking
> about
> > going to Upper Guk to hunt Frogglock for Netted, Woven and Mesh stuff.
He
> > needs to go there sooner or later for 2 rogue quest items.
> > Well, Gary aka Garren knows that I have been to Guk(innoluthe Swamp)
when
> i
> > was just a lvl 6. Needless to say, It was a messy death being hit by a
> bunch
> > of 5 Kobolds and its lead monster JoJo. I lost my Netted golves there
> too.
> > The one that Gary so kindly bought for me for 2PP. That was alot of
> money
> > for a lvl 4 player that time. Thx again Gary :) (psst..i still owe u
> 2pp,
> > not?)
>
> I really wish to hunt with u guys but I quite worry my xp rise very slow
> coz of the big gap. I once hunt with u and Eldor and even thou we killed
> alot of stuffs white/black/yellow to me, my xp didn't rise much. ;(
>
> > Ok. Im very interested to go adventuring this weekend (sat). Either to
> the
> > Eastern Continent or Upper Guk. Anyone of U guys intersted?. Upper Guk
> > should have something for u there. if not than u shouldnt waste time
> making
> > the trip.
> > Faydwek is interesting for a monk like me, cos i dont think there r many
> > monks there. I can tank well and hit well now. With double attack and
> dual
> > wielding , i think its ok.
>
> With u and Eldor, maybe we can consider going for mino cave where u can
> find mino axe that sell for 5pp. I went with Les 2 night ago just to
> suffer a dreadful death when 3 mino slave gang bang me ;(
>
> > Let me know if any of u guys r keen on any of this expedition.
> > BTW, goin to upper Guk.... We will have to go NAKED. ya, i mean .Nothing
> on.
> > Zip. Zero.( well, food and drinks r basic items) . Its like a one-way
> trip.
> > If no Wiz or Shaman is with us and we r not bind or SOW. If / when we
> died
> > there, we leave our corpse behind. Save all our goodies in the bank b4
we
> > go.
>
> Which is the nearest town to upper guk? Leshrec can bind liao, but he can
> only bind group to a city, thou he can bind himself anywhere. Wiz's ac is
> already low, if we go there naked, we will kena screw faster, hehe.
>
>
> > Hit Frogglocks, get woven and mesh and get out. I should think that Guk
> is
> > a whole day trip of 6 hrs(real Time), including hunting. Getting there
is
> > pretty fast. about 15 mins(real time).
> > Any suggestions?
>
> Me wanna go too, provided I can get xp and survive to hold the xp gained,
> heh. I will try to work hard this 2 nights, see if I can hit lvl 11 or
> even 12 (fat hope I know, hehe).
>
> Ziltus
>
> p/s: Anyone can help me to buy a runed totem staff? It cost 20-30pp,
> Leshrec got his at 20pp. I will pay back slowly, thx in advance ;)
>
> > -----Original Message-----
> > From: Leshrec <leshrec@...>
> > To: <sg-everquest@onelist.com>
> > Date: Wednesday, June 02, 1999 8:39 AM
> > Subject: Re: [sg-everquest] sail the high seas
> >
> >
> > >From: "Leshrec" <leshrec@...>
> > >
> > >Freeport is in my opinion the best place to run xp for levels 1-10.
> > Firstly,
> > >its the human city, so being the most frequently used race(Look at the
> > >amount of classes they can play), the hunting grounds is the most
> varied.
> > >East commons have stuff for level 1-10 and being such a linear area,
you
> > can
> > >run away from stuff quite easily and zone out. As for befallen, try not
> to
> > >go there at lower levels. Even if you are cautious, someone might train
> up
> > >ghouls and such and they can root ya. Being level 6, their 30dam hit
> would
> > >be very fatal indeed ) As for loot, commonlands are also one of the
best
> > >place for loot ) Fighting lioness and lions, you can get the occasional
> > high
> > >quality cat pelt or the ruined lion pet which can fetch for a few gold
> > >pieces. The asps and darkweed snakes have giant snake fangs which go
for
> up
> > >to 1pp to human players and younger kodiacs sometime gives grizzly pelt
> > >which sells for 4-5 gp to NPCs. Once you get about level 11-12, you can
> > hunt
> > >wisps. They give lightstones and greater lightstones which go for 1pp
> and
> > >5pp respectively to other players and a bit less for NPC. Well if you
> need
> > >any other information, feel free to send me a tell.
> > >
> > >Leshrec
> > >
> > >-----Original Message-----
> > >From: Entreri <drizzt@...>
> > >To: sg-everquest@onelist.com <sg-everquest@onelist.com>
> > >Date: Wednesday, June 02, 1999 8:06 AM
> > >Subject: Re: [sg-everquest] sail the high seas
> > >
> > >
> > >>From: "Entreri" <drizzt@...>
> > >>
> > >>If u come to freeport,u would have a few options[stating the places
Ive
> > >been
> > >>to]
> > >>
> > >>
> > >>East and West commons has quite alot of high xp animals,orcs,scarabs
> > >>
> > >>If u wanna be more daring,u can try Befallen in West Commons Desert
> where
> > >>dread lords,Greater Skeles spawn
> > >>
> > >>
> > >>Entreri
> > >>

> > >>>
> > >>>i mjust level6 and was wondering if i should leave butcherblock for
> > >>>freeport yet? r there any monsters for my level tat give good loot in
> > >>>freeport cause over here the loot sux sour frog ass.i m fightin for
xp
> > >>>only.advise freportians pls.
